00040     static void init_options() {
00041       alias("workers", "Hypertable.Client.Workers");

00046     static void init_options() { init_master_client_options(); }
00047     static void init() { init_master_client(); }
00048   };

00060                      DefaultCommPolicy> ClientPolicies;
